name: Psycho (Akarius)
description:
in Psycho you play the consciousness of a person. he has to face the problems of her life (tax, work ...) but also little flees at the risk of them coming back stronger.

This game was created during the Game Dev Party 17 in 2021 December on Lyon. 

The game was create by : 

Benjamin Lebegue - Game Artist

Jean Bessede (Akarius) - Sound Design

Léo Malassagne - Programmer

Whiskas - Programmer

Hugo Kelfani - Programmer

Thx for playing !
